description: The director Halina Reijn narrates a sequence from her thriller featuring Amandla Stenberg and Maria Bakalova.
title: Watch a Tense Pool Scene From ‘Bodies Bodies Bodies’
title_page: Watch a Tense Pool Scene From ‘Bodies Bodies Bodies’ - The New York Times
maintext:
In “Anatomy of a Scene,” we ask directors to reveal the secrets that go into making key scenes in their movies. See new episodes in the series on Fridays. You can also watch our collection of more than 150 videos on YouTube and subscribe to our YouTube channel.
This early scene from the satire-thriller “Bodies Bodies Bodies” takes a deep breath before introducing its cast.
Soon after the sequence begins, it heads underwater, with the characters emerging to find that Sophie (Amandla Stenberg) has arrived at (or crashed?) their party.
